column10: {"type":"passive","color":"金色油漆","icon":"mdi-lightning-bolt","max":1,"effect":[{"name":"每当前能量 +{0} 力量","type":"tag","value":"$[lvl  \\cdot  0.02]$"},{"name":"每丢失能量 +{0} 能量再生","type":"tag","value":"$[lvl  \\cdot  0.005]$"}]}
column11: {"type":"激活的卡片","color":"红色油漆","icon":"mdi-knife","max":1,"cooldown":"$8$","activeCost":"${ energy: 30 }$","激活的卡片":"$[{ type: 'damagePhysic', value: 2, str: 0.1, int: 0.1 }]$","activeType":"combat"}
